title: Docker Fundamentals Part 2
description:
This workshop was recorded live. Some live elements have been cut out for your enjoyment. Be sure to make use of the timestamps below. Enjoy!

0:00 Introduction
5:03 Persistent Data
6:45 Bind Mounts
11:54 Volumes
16:16 Persistent Data Live Demo
39:14 Multiple Containers
45:40 Multiple Containers Live Demo
47:45 Docker Compose
59:46 Docker Compose Live Demo
1:28:08 Week 2 Assignment
